remarks: If the relation produces open sets, preimage maps of a random variable are measurable sets.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jan-2017.)
statement:
orrvccel.1 $e |- ( ph -> P e. Prob ) $.
orrvccel.2 $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( rRndVar ` P ) ) $.
orrvccel.4 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
orrvcoel.5 $e |- ( ph -> { y e. RR | y R A } e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) $.
orrvcoel $p |- ( ph -> ( X oRVC R A ) e. dom P ) $.
$d A y $.
$d R y $.
$d X y $.
